alert.note: Alert for Sabine; San Augustine; Shelby (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 25 at 2:04AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern De Soto, central Red River and western Sabine Parishes, southeastern Shelby, eastern San Augustine and Sabine Counties through 300 AM CDT... At 203 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Mansfield to near Patroon to near Browndell. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Milam, Coushatta, Zwolle, Hemphill, Pineland, Converse, Patroon, Rosevine, Oak Grove, Pleasant Hill, Huxley, Noble, Edgefield, Belmont, Hanna, Bronson, Pelican, McElroy, Yellowpine and Armistead. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If on or near Toledo Bend, get out of the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Remember, lightning can strike out to 10 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for eastern Texas.
